```{r, cache=cacheon, fig.cap=paste0("Riket, alla ", nrow(qiinfo), " kvalitetsindikatorer ",  global_year), fig.width=9, fig.height=6}

summaryqifunchelper <- function(qi) {
  if (!!sym(qi) == "qi_followreg3m") {
    tmp <- rsdata %>%
      filter(
        indexdtm >= ymd(paste0(global_year - 1, "-07-01 - ")) &
          indexdtm <= ymd(paste0(global_year, "-07-01"))
      )
  } else {
    tmp <- rsdata %>%
      filter(
        indexdtm >= global_startdtm &
          indexdtm <= global_stopdtm
      )
  }
  tmp <- tmp %>%
    filter(
      !is.na(hfdurindex) &
        ttype == qiinfo %>%
          filter(qivar == qi) %>%
          pull(timepoint)
    )

  tmp <- tmp %>%
    filter(!is.na(!!sym(qi))) %>%
    group_by(hfdurindex, .drop = F) %>%
    count(!!sym(qi), .drop = F) %>%
    mutate(
      tot = sum(n),
      percent = as.numeric(fn(n / tot * 100, 0))
    ) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    filter(!!sym(qi) == 1) %>%
    mutate(qivar = qi) %>%
    select(-!!sym(qi))
}

stat <- lapply(qiinfo$qivar, summaryqifunchelper)

stat2 <- bind_rows(stat)

stat2 <- stat2 %>%
  mutate(
    hfdurindex = replace_na(hfdurindex, levels(stat2$hfdurindex)[2]),
    cols = case_when(
      hfdurindex == levels(stat2$hfdurindex)[1] ~ global_colsblue[2],
      hfdurindex == levels(stat2$hfdurindex)[2] ~ global_colsblue[5]
    )
  )

stat2 <- stat2 %>%
  mutate(
    ntot = paste0(n, " av ", tot),
    per = paste0(percent, "%"),
    per = if_else(tot < 10, "", per),
    ntot = if_else(tot < 10, "", ntot),
    percent = if_else(tot < 10, 0, percent),
    row = 1:n()
  )

stat2 <- left_join(stat2, qiinfo, by = "qivar")

stat2$qishortname <- forcats::fct_reorder(stat2$qishortname, stat2$row)

cexmy <- 0.9
# c(bottom, left, top, right)
par(mar = c(10, 4, 3.7, 0) + 0.1)


b <- barplot(stat2$percent,
  space = c(0, rep(c(0, 1), 14), 0),
  axes = FALSE,
  ylab = "Procent",
  xlab = "",
  col = stat2$cols,
  border = "white",
  # names.arg = rep(NA, nrow(qiinfo)),
  cex.lab = cexmy,
  ylim = c(0, 100),
  las = 2, cex.names = cexmy
)

axis(2, seq(0, 100, 20), cex.axis = cexmy, las = 2)

bplace <- b[c(seq(1, length(b), 2))]

for (i in seq_along(bplace)) {
  lines(
    x = c(bplace[i] - 0.5, bplace[i] + 1.5),
    y = c(qiinfo$ll[i], qiinfo$ll[i]) * 100, col = global_colslimit[2], lty = 2, lwd = 1
  )
  lines(
    x = c(bplace[i] - 0.5, bplace[i] + 1.5),
    y = c(qiinfo$ul[i], qiinfo$ul[i]) * 100, col = global_colslimit[1], lty = 2, lwd = 1
  )
}

legend("topright", levels(stat2$hfdurindex), fill = global_colsblue[c(2, 5)], border = global_colsblue[c(2, 5)], bty = "n", cex = cexmy)

axis(3,
  at = b,
  labels = stat2$ntot, line = -1, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy * 0.8, hadj = 0, gap.axis = -10000000, las = 2
)

axis(1,
  at = bplace + 0.5,
  labels = qiinfo$qishortname, line = -0.5, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy, gap.axis = -10000000, las = 2
)

axis(1,
  at = b[5] + (b[6] - b[5]) / 2,
  labels = "Index", line = 6.1, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy, gap.axis = -10000000, las = 1
)

axis(1,
  at = b[22],
  labels = "3 månaders uppföljningen", line = 6.1, tick = FALSE, cex.axis = cexmy, gap.axis = -10000000, las = 1
)

posarrow <- -47.5
arrows(b[1], posarrow, b[4], posarrow, xpd = TRUE, code = 1, length = 0.1)
arrows(b[7], posarrow, b[10], posarrow, xpd = TRUE, code = 2, length = 0.1)

arrows(b[13], posarrow, b[18], posarrow, xpd = TRUE, code = 1, length = 0.1)
arrows(b[26], posarrow, b[30], posarrow, xpd = TRUE, code = 2, length = 0.1)

legend("bottom",
  inset = c(-0, -.65), xpd = NA,
  legend = labnams[2:3],
  lty = 2,
  col = global_colslimit,
  bty = "n",
  cex = cexmy,
  horiz = TRUE
)
```
